item.title: PHYS105-lecture-20200514
item.description: Announcements # Today # Clickers # Clockwise around the PV diagram is negative work done on the gas. Discussion # Container on the left contains 3 times the thermal energy because it has 3 times the amount of particles, even tho the temperatures are the same. The disorder is proportional to the number of available states (boxes that you can divide each curve into). More temp = more disordered state.
